name: Dapper - Desvalido Disla - Toro
additionalNotes: The Desvalido Disla is a reimagined follow-up to the popular Desvalido cigar. Ian Reith, Dapper Cigar Co. founder, approached Raul Disla of the Nicaragua American Cigars S.A. (NACSA) factory, and asked him if could recreate a version of the original. This resulted in a bolder and much more flavorful iteration of the original. Dislaâ€™s version uses the same blend but with more Nicaraguan tobacco.
